Nicotine In Vivo: Intake, Distribution, Elimination, and Measurement AUTHOR(SYCO-AUTHOR(s) Riley A. Davis, R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company and Dr. Margareta Curvall, Swedish Match, Snuff Division, Research and Analysis, Stockholm, Sweden PURPOSE OF DOCUMENT PUBLICATION IN PRESENTATION AT 53rd Tobacco Science ResearchConference LOCATION DATE Montreal, Ontario, Canada September 12, 1915 OTHER PERTINENT INFORMATION This presentation is a synopsis of a book chapter written by the author and co-author that has been approved by the PPRC for publication. KEYWORDS: Nicotine, cotinine, nicotine metabolites, serum, saliva, urine, nicotine intake, absorption, distribution, clearance, nicotine intake equations, nicotine sources.
